attributes.action: Establish a Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE)
attributes.additional_details:
We believe there is waste across Government Departments which needs rooting out.
There are areas across all Government Departments which can be looked out.
Firstly, all Diversity, Equality and Inclusion initiatives and positions should be abolished.
Look at cutting waste in:

Workforce reduction across the Civil Service
Procurement contracts
Cancellation of contracts/leases across Government
Renegotiations of contracts/leases across Government.

Cut the waste!
Beginning at the top!
attributes.background:
The incoming Trump Administration in America has established a Department for Government Efficiency.
We call upon HM Government to take a leaf out of President Trump's book and establish the equivalent department for our country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create the Department of Government Efficiency
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
